name: Dalgona Candy Master Challenge
description:
Do you know how to make dolgona candy? now it's the time. Let’s make the dalgona candy step by step today and have the candy challenge. Win the candy game and you can enjoy the dalgona candy.

* Add all the ingredients to make dalgona candy
* Choose the candy shapes as you like
* Play the candy challenge game to win
* Enjoy your dalgona candy
* Unlock more candy shapes
